Time 
  public final double Time()
Return the current simulation time.

next_ev 
  public synchronized SimulationProcess next_ev() throws SimulationException, NoSuchElementException
Return the next simulation process which will run.

evtime 
  public final double evtime()
Return the simulation time at which this process will run.

ActivateBefore 
  public void ActivateBefore(SimulationProcess p) throws SimulationException, RestartException
Activate this process before process 'p'. This process must not be running, or on the scheduler queue.

ActivateAfter 
  public void ActivateAfter(SimulationProcess p) throws SimulationException, RestartException
Activate this process after process 'p'. This process must not be running, or on the scheduler queue.

ActivateAt 
  public void ActivateAt(double AtTime,
                         boolean prior) throws SimulationException, RestartException
Activate this process at the specified simulation time. This process must not be running, or on the scheduler queue. 'AtTime' must be greater than, or equal to, the current simulation time. If 'prior' is true then this process will appear in the simulation queue before any other process with the same simulation time.

ActivateAt 
  public void ActivateAt(double AtTime) throws SimulationException, RestartException
Activate this process at the specified simulation time. This process must not be running, or on the scheduler queue. 'AtTime' must be greater than, or equal to, the current simulation time.

ActivateDelay 
  public void ActivateDelay(double Delay,
                            boolean prior) throws SimulationException, RestartException
This process will be activated after 'Delay' units of simulation time. This process must not be running, or on the scheduler queue. 'Delay' must be greater than, or equal to, zero. If 'prior' is true then this process will appear in the simulation queue before any other process with the same simulation time.

ActivateDelay 
  public void ActivateDelay(double Delay) throws SimulationException, RestartException
This process will be activated after 'Delay' units of simulation time. This process must not be running, or on the scheduler queue. 'Delay' must be greater than, or equal to, zero.

Activate 
  public void Activate() throws SimulationException, RestartException
Activate this process at the current simulation time. This process must not be running, or on the scheduler queue.

ReActivateBefore 
  public void ReActivateBefore(SimulationProcess p) throws SimulationException, RestartException
Reactivate this process before process 'p'.

ReActivateAfter 
  public void ReActivateAfter(SimulationProcess p) throws SimulationException, RestartException
Reactivate this process after process 'p'.

ReActivateAt 
  public void ReActivateAt(double AtTime,
                           boolean prior) throws SimulationException, RestartException
Reactivate this process at the specified simulation time. 'AtTime' must be valid. If 'prior' is true then this process will appear in the simulation queue before any other process with the same simulation time.

ReActivateAt 
  public void ReActivateAt(double AtTime) throws SimulationException, RestartException
Reactivate this process at the specified simulation time. 'AtTime' must be valid.

ReActivateDelay 
  public void ReActivateDelay(double Delay,
                              boolean prior) throws SimulationException, RestartException
Reactivate this process after 'Delay' units of simulation time. If 'prior' is true then this process will appear in the simulation queue before any other process with the same simulation time.

ReActivateDelay 
  public void ReActivateDelay(double Delay) throws SimulationException, RestartException
Reactivate this process after 'Delay' units of simulation time.

  public void ReActivate() throws SimulationException, RestartException
